vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in SimpleDAO.withdraw (patch_3.sol#11-20):
	External calls:
	- res = msg.sender.call.value(amount)() (patch_3.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- credit (patch_3.sol#16)
	- frozenAccount (patch_3.sol#17)
